text:
- HBO Max is Warner Media's
direct-to-consumer platform,

offering the best-in-class
quality entertainment.
We launched our platform in May of 2020,
and we recently began our global rollout,

by launching in 39 markets
across Latin America,
and we recently just launched in Europe.

We have about 70 million
customers globally,
and we need AWS to kinda like help us out
as we continue to scale.
We have massive scale coming up in 2022,

and partnering with AWS
allows us to meet that demand.
And we built an event-driven architecture
that helps us make sure
that security's part of the infrastructure
that's supporting our scale.
So we use a lot of Lambda functions

to actually help drive
security remediations.

So it allows our developers
to scale without fear,

they could actually go
out there, innovate,
and have some fun,

and know that the security
team has their back.
Our global scale is paramount for us,
looking at how AWS is gonna help us,

and looking at other
things that we're gonna do

within the platform, not just
streaming static content,

but also looking at live
and and live streaming,

and bringing in a lot
more sporting events.

And AWS is really gonna
help us do that, as well,

really distinguish us
in that streaming space,
across our competitive landscape.
